description: Choose the ground floor for a quick meal and the first floor for a special dinner in this restaurant near the cinema - theatre. In both cases, the menu focuses on traditional fish dishes from the Veneto, such as black and white tagliolini with squid, scampi and courgettes. The honey semifreddo with caramel is the perfect way to round off your meal.
